body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Adam Rivera and I'm a customer service agent at Car Solutions Inc. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Diana. Can you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, six seven eight, nine zero one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Diana. Do you also mind sharing your address with me for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my address is two three four, Elm Street, Cityville, StateXYZ, zero one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Diana. Is there anything else you'd like to share or inquire about today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, I think that covers it. I appreciate your assistance.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Diana. Thank you for reaching out to us. If you have any further questions in the future, don't hesitate to contact us. Have a great day!
